name: AC Drain Wiz (Core 1.0)
description: One-time installed drain line maintenance access/cleanout device that enables fast, repeatable service without cutting lines.
key_benefits: One-time install; ongoing access without cutting
Proactive, faster cleanouts; fewer emergency calls
Increases technician efficiency and daily job count

codes_and_compliance.notes: Supports maintenance access and approved disposal locations per IMC sections commonly referenced for residential condensate lines.

install.tools_required: Standard HVAC service tools; no specialized tools required
process_highlights: Solvent weld into line (TBD: exact joint details)
Use clear body to verify flow/blockage

open_items: Exact materials/resin spec and UV/temp ratings
Final socket dimensions, wall thickness, and tolerances
